Subject: Espacio lleno de disco
Description:
Necesitamos su apoyo para realizar la ampliación del disco en el servidor de EPP,, debido a que muestra mensaje de que actualmente se encuentra lleno.
muestra el siguiente msg:
Your appliance is on critical low disk space, there is only 0 free available from 257.22 gb (0%). EPP Server functionality and performance may be severely affected. Use Audit Log Backup to reduce the logs stored in the database, delete older system and audit log backups, and tune policies to reduce incoming log count. For further assistance contact Support.
You will be automatically logged out in 3 minutes.
Solution_Comment__c: The issue was resolved by cleaning the disk space in the backend. There was a big(+250GB) syslog file that we removed as the logs were already on SIEM and the customer only needed the logs from the last 3 months on the EPP Server, which were in place.
